rock-en-delire.description:
Rock en délire is a fictional project realized during my first year of DUT MMI. Our team was composed of a Redactor, a Community Manager and a Developer.

My personal goal for this project was to learn the ReactJS library, in order to facilitate the creation of one page web applications.
rock-en-delire.challenges: The festival needed more visibility as well as to strengthen the fidelity of those who had come to the previous editions.
rock-en-delire.solutions: We proposed a redesign of the logo as well as the development of a website in ReactJS without refreshment and with a local database in JSON.

1.title: The logo
1.text: For this redesign, we wanted to freshen up the image of the festival while keeping the Rock'n'Roll style. We opted for a typographic logo. The font was entirely created to represent this geometric and quirky side.
